globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 2
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 3
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
You are here with a pair of Duros to destroy a new warship prototype the Empire is preparing to launch. You walk through the sewers toward the Imperial testing ground, hoping you remain unnoticed. After a while, the Duros stop you.

{-} Deploy the Rebel Saboteurs to the red highlighted spaces.
{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

eventActions.theText:
"This is the spot," one of the Duros says. "We've got plenty of charges, so let us handle that ship when we get in. You just keep their troops off our backs."

{-} Apply additional health equal to twice the threat level to the Rebel Saboteurs. When a Rebel Saboteur is attacked while adjacent to a healthy hero who could be a target of that attack, that hero may suffer 2 {C} to become the target of that attack.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Testing Site opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

{-} Apply additional health equal to twice the threat level to the Rebel Saboteurs. When a Rebel Saboteur is attacked while adjacent to a healthy hero who could be a target of that attack, that hero may suffer 2 {C} to become the target of that attack.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Testing Site opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
An Imperial officer shouts to his troops to run as you plant the last charge on the ship. You run as fast as you can, hearing a massive explosion behind you.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Heroes receive the Rebel Saboteurs as allies.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
With an audible whine, the ship powers up. Before you can try to finish the job, it lifts into the air.

Instead of rocketing out of sight, however, it maneuvers into a high arc before swooping toward the ground. Bright red blaster fire erupts toward you.

You barely escape with your lives.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Outer Defenses
globalEvents.eventText: As you advance towards the test location, the guards, now alerted to your presence, begin to respond with more organization and firepower.

globalEvents.name: Protect the Prototype
globalEvents.eventText: You enter the testing site and see a terrifying warship with deadly weapons.

entityProperties.name: Door 1
entityProperties.theText: The hangar door leads into the testing site where the warship is supposed to be.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The green highlighted spaces on the Testing Site form the warship. A figure can attack the warship (Health: 10 plus *2*, Defense: *1* {G}).
{-} A Rebel Saboteur can interact with the warship. If it does, the warship suffers 5 {H}. Limit once per figure per round.
The prototype is so awe-inspiring that you almost don't notice the Trandoshan guards bearing down on you.

You raise your weapons and move in to protect your allies.

{-} The Rebels win when the warship is destroyed.

{-} Apply additional health equal to twice the threat level to the Rebel Saboteurs. When a Rebel Saboteur is attacked while adjacent to a healthy hero who could be a target of that attack, that hero may suffer 2 {C} to become the target of that attack.
{-} The green highlighted spaces on the Testing Site form the warship. A figure can attack the warship (Health: 10 plus *2*, Defense: *1* {G}).
{-} A Rebel Saboteur can interact with the warship. If it does, the warship suffers 5 {H}. Limit once per figure per round.
{-} The Rebels win when the warship is destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

entityProperties.name: Warship
entityProperties.theText:
The fighter prototype looks intimidating, loaded with enough weapons to blow up even capital ships. It looks almost flight-ready.

{-} A figure can attack the warship (Health: 10 plus *2*, Defense: *1* {G}).
{-} A Rebel Saboteur can interact with the warship. If it does, the warship suffers 5 {H}. Limit once per figure per round.

entityProperties.name: Door 1
entityProperties.theText: The hangar door leads into the testing site where the warship is supposed to be.
